attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have signed up to more e-petitions than you can shake a stick at. Not one has had a successful outcome. The stock reply seems to be: "Thank you for your petition but we have already made up our minds and your opinion will not change our policies"

Stop wasting our time Mr Brown. This is a placebo to make us think we can make a difference. Be honest for once and scrap it.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk. Or you can write to the Prime Minister with your concerns: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
